Name: Monophobia
About the game: Abstract. Challenging. Mind-blowing. Monophobia. Monophobia is a 3D abstract perspective-based puzzle game. Play through eight different chapters, each with their own theme, and discover how good your perception of depth and space really is. Whether it's a bridge you cannot see at first, disappearing platforms, or an image broken into a million pieces, you will learn to distrust your very own mind. In addition, your cognitive thinking, memory, but also your platforming skills will be put to the test. Play Monophobia, and rethink puzzle games as a whole.
